Documentation

A simple documentation to keep the learning simple.

Available for offline use.

Introduction

What is neptune? Neptune is just a simple CSS library with a set of components that I use in my works and my side projects.

We always use components, neptune components are UI Beauty and UX friendly, not all devs like to use big frameworks like Bootstrap or Materialize. Sometimes we need simple things to build simple apps.

With Neptune you can use this simple responsive components with your custom CSS files.

Setup

You can use our CDN or download the components.

<link rel="stylesheet" href="http://cdn.cloudfire/neptuno/neptuno.css">
